content.value: A year ago today, I got home from an international trip, and haven't left the country since. I have no idea when I was last in the UK for a continuous year but it's definitely over a decade. I did say I wanted to travel less for work .... #BeCarefulWhatYouWishFor
content.html: A year ago today, I got home from an international trip, and haven't left the country since. I have no idea when I was last in the UK for a continuous year but it's definitely over a decade. I did say I wanted to travel less for work .... #BeCarefulWhatYouWishFor
